availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George Thomas Schoolfield, Sr. (Bracken County farmer)

body.p: Bracken County, Kentucky, farmer. Maryland native. Married Mary Schoolfield. Father of Benjamin Schoolfield, Emma Schoolfield, Charles Schoolfield, Arabella Schoolfield, Laura Schoolfield, Ida Schoolfield, and Douglass Schoolfield. Farmer in Bracken County in 1850 and 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bracken County, Unnamed District, p. 429; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bracken County, District No. 1, p. 70; Find A Grave, "George Schoolfield (1801 - 1877)," Memorial #119401209, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=119401209 (accessed July 17, 2017).
